DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this protocol is to provide SU011248 treatment for patients who have participated in a SU011248 protocol and are eligible to enter this protocol
DOC.brief_title: Rollover Protocol for Prior SU011248 Protocols
DOC.criteria: Prior SU011248 Protocol. Eligible to continue SU011248 treatment. Uncontrolled CNS metastasis. Unfit to receive SU011248.
